# ek.survival

This package contains functions I use in my projects to handle survival data such as the `kaplan_scan()` function or plotting helper functions.

## Installation

Install the released version of ek.survival from [Github](https://github.com/koncina/ek.survival) with:

``` r
devtools::install("koncina/ek.survival")
```
